casebody.data:
AMERICAN HOSPITAL ASS’N et al., Plaintiffs-Appellees, v. CHAS. PFIZER & CO. et al., Defendants-Appellees, California Physicians’ Service, Applicant for Intervention-Appellant. No. 90, Docket 71-1492. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 7, 1971. Decided Oct. 13, 1971. William C. Woodson, New York City (Richard T. Davis, Choate, Regan, Davis & Hollister, New York City, on the brief), for appellant. Benjamin F. Schwartz, Herbert A. Karzen, Bruce Warner, Schwartz & Al-schuler, Los Angeles, Cal., for plaintiffs-appellees.

Before MOORE, HAYS and FEIN-BERG, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

We affirm the judgment of the district court on the opinion of Judge Wyatt.
